Articles.Content:
> 
> I just looked at the source, am I correct in assuming that Clamshell is default?

Yes they are the default. You need do nothing (except install the mod) and your fairings will clamshell by default.

I don't know if it will work on ships you already built, though. Those may keep the confetti fairings as that's how they were set when built.
I love how you call them confetti. Because they are.

> 
> I love how you call them confetti. Because they are.

It's the best name I've found for them. It explains what they are, is quite accurate, and doesn't imply "OMG KSP IS BROKEN I HATE SQUAD THEY ARE SO DUMB," at least not to me.

holy crap you can embed tweets here?!? I could use that...

> 
> Personally, I don't consider confetti separation to be "broken", even if aesthetically I'd prefer clamshell.

Same here. While it's unfortunate Squad didn't include an option for clamshell, the current stock implementation of fairings is *totally* kerbal, and it seems most of the community has gotten a bit too serious about the game to accept this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Thank you for this mod! I have used inter-stage and final stage confetti fairings only to have them rip my ship apart. Can't wait to see if this helps.

Hey there, This is a work of beauty!

I stream once a week, I'll make sure to feature it, and encourage people to use/donate!

Thank you so much!
Compatible with 1.0.4?
Yep, looks fine
Yep no issues here either works beautifully why squad never included the option to have clamshell style over confetti amazes me

no more freggrenades on top of my rockets FINALY 

thanks a lot for this mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Useful mod, thanks for sharing!
The mod we needed
How did i miss this mod. Yoink!
Does anyone know of anything that adds sounds to the fairings to make them sound a bit beefier?

Great, simple and efficient mod!

Maybe you would be interested in implementing this idea?: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132000-Mod-idea-fairing-struts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132000-Mod-idea-fairing-struts)
Marked for later use ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Stock Clamshell Fairings + Stock Fairing Tweaker=A pretty good 2,5m and 3,75m 2 part clamshell fairing!!!!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):kiss:
I was really disappointed when I saw the first Stock fairings. This mod makes it so much better.
Does this work well with 1.05?

> 
> Does this work well with 1.05?

Works great!
Yep, 100% functional.  You should update the KSP version over at Kerbal Stuff.
Since Kerbalstuff has died, and Spacedock.info has replaced it, you'll need to update it there... Just spreading the word. I really care about this mod, and want others to see it too.

Might I just ask if this one is being maintained?

Or has it it been supplanted by another mod doing the same thing?

Been away for a while!

It's a stock feature now.
Oh excellent, thanks for the reply!
